entities.name: binns
entities.description: Binns is described as someone who droned on and on while the students scribbled down names and dates.

entities.name: emeric the evil
entities.description: Emeric the Evil is mentioned as a person whose name was mixed up with Uric the Oddball.

entities.name: uric the oddball
entities.description: Uric the Oddball is mentioned as a person whose name was mixed up with Emeric the Evil.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is described as a tiny little wizard who had to stand on a pile of books to see over his desk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the student whose name caused Professor Flitwick to give an excited squeak and topple out of sight.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is described as strict and clever.

relationships.description: Binns mixed up Emeric the Evil with Uric the Oddball.
Binns mixed up Uric the Oddball with Emeric the Evil.
Professor Flitwick was excited by Harry's name and toppled out of sight.
